message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting strong, I'll try to counter!
You're trying to take advantage, but I'll give you a better deal this time!
You're getting desperate, I'll make it worth your while!
You're getting too greedy, I'll give you a slightly better deal this time!
You're not getting any younger, I'll give you one last chance!

You're getting bold, but I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
You're running out of time, this is my final offer!
